org.hkijena.jipipe.api

Interface JIPipeRunnable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivateAndApplyUpdateSiteRun, ActivateUpdateSiteRun, AllCacheToNonVirtualRun, AllCacheToVirtualRun, ApplyRun, BasicMinicondaEnvPythonInstaller, BasicPortableEnvPythonInstaller, CacheToNonVirtualRun, CacheToVirtualRun, CellposeEasyInstaller, CleanBackupsRun, DeactivateAndApplyUpdateSiteRun, DownloadOfflineManualRun, EasyInstallExternalEnvironmentInstaller, ExternalEnvironmentInstaller, ExtractTemplateZipFileRun, ImagePlusResultImportRun, ImageViewerPanelRawImageExporterRun, ImageViewerStackExporterRun, ImageViewerVideoExporterRun, JIPipeDataDisplayWrapperImportOperation.ImportDataRun, JIPipeDataTableToFilesByMetadataExporterRun, JIPipeDataTableToOutputExporterRun, JIPipeDataTableToZIPExporterRun, JIPipeGraphRunner, JIPipeImportCachedSlotOutputRun, JIPipeProjectRun, JIPipePythonAdapterLibraryEnvironmentInstaller, JIPipeResultCopyFilesByMetadataExporterRun, LoadResultDirectoryIntoCacheRun, LoadResultZipIntoCacheRun, MinicondaCellposeEnvInstaller, MinicondaCellposeGPUEnvInstaller, MinicondaEnvPythonInstaller, NodeTemplateDownloaderRun, OMEImageResultImportRun, OmniposeEasyInstaller, PortableCellposeEnvInstaller, PortableCellposeGPUEnvInstaller, PortableEnvPythonInstaller, ProjectTemplateDownloaderRun, PythonEasyInstaller, PythonPackageLibraryEnvironmentInstaller, QuickRun, REasyInstaller, RefreshRepositoryRun, RenderPipelineRun, REnvInstaller, SaveProjectAndCacheToDirectoryRun, SaveProjectAndCacheToZipRun, SelectCondaEnvPythonInstaller, SelectSystemPythonInstaller, SelectVirtualEnvPythonInstaller

    public interface JIPipeRunnable
extends Runnable
    Runnable that can be scheduled, canceled, and reports progress

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JIPipeProgressInfo getProgressInfo()
      The info object that allows communication with the run
      String getTaskLabel()
      A name for the runnable
      default void onFinished(Consumer<RunWorkerFinishedEvent> function)
      Registers an event subscriber into JIPipeRunnerQueue that listens for when this run finishes

      Registers an event subscriber into JIPipeRunnerQueue that listens for when this run is interrupted
      default void onProgress(Consumer<RunWorkerProgressEvent> function)
      Registers an event subscriber into JIPipeRunnerQueue that listens for when this run is progressing
      default void onStarted(Consumer<RunWorkerStartedEvent> function)
